item.title: On Ramachandra Guha
item.description: The greatest thing a human soul ever does in this world is to see something and tell what it saw in a plain way. Hundreds of people can talk for one who can think, but thousands can think for one who can see. To see clearly is poetry, prophecy and religion, all in one. -- John Ruskin Every generation have its heroes, dead and alive. The dead are discovered by writing they left behind.
